mapper.select: select count(*) as task_status_count from task where project_id = 1 group by task_status order by TASK_STATUS
select u.user_name ,t.* from task t , user_info u where t.user_id = u.user_id
select project_id , task_status ,task_subject from task order by TASK_STATUS

SELECT t.user_id, u.user_name, t.task_status, count(t.task_status) status_count from TASK t , USER_INFO u WHERE t.project_id=1 and t.USER_ID = u.USER_ID group by u.user_name,t.task_status,t.user_id order by u.user_name, t.task_status
